1-Handed. Gathers wood.

A diverse weapon that allows for ranged throwing attacks or rapid close quarters attacks. Ideal for aggressive, fully committed close quarters melee combat or tactical medium range combat.

•Light Attack: Deals {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_PrimaryAttack.DmgCoef * 100]}% <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_slash_opaque" xPadding="0" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img> damage.
•Light Ender: Deals {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_PrimaryAttack_Ender.DmgCoef * 100]}% <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_slash_opaque" xPadding="0" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img> damage.
•Heavy Attack: Deals {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_HeavyAttack.DmgCoef * 100]}% <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_slash_opaque" xPadding="0" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img> damage.

1-Handed. Gathers plants.
2-Handed. Gathers trees.
1-Handed. Gathers boulders, ore veins, and oil.
2-Handed. Gathers boulders, ore veins, and oil.

A pairing of melee-focused weapons that, when combined, offer solid offensive and defensive capabilities. Utilizes a combination of arcing swings and lunges for the offensive attacks and a shield to maximize defenses.

•Light Attack: Deals {[DamageTable.1H_Sword_Attack1.DmgCoef * 100]}% <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_slash_opaque" xPadding="0" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img> damage.

•Charged Heavy: Deals {[DamageTable.1H_Sword_Attack2_Charged.DmgCoef * 100]}% <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_thrust_opaque" xPadding="0" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img> damage.

A speed oriented melee weapon with a variety of quick lunge attacks. Excels at precise timing and outmaneuvering opponents while applying bleeds that gradually drain the target’s health.

•Light Attack: Deals {[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_PrimaryAttack.DmgCoef * 100]}% <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_thrust_opaque" xPadding="0" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img> damage.
•Light Middle Swipes: Deals {[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_PrimaryTwoThirdsAttack.DmgCoef * 100]}% <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_thrust_opaque" xPadding="0" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img> damage.
•Heavy Attack: Deals {[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_HeavyAttack.DmgCoef * 100]}% <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_thrust_opaque" xPadding="0" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img> damage.
1-Handed.
1-Handed.

A large melee weapon with wide arcing swings and powerful chopping attacks. Ideal for engaging multiple enemies with AoE damage or dealing extreme damage to single targets.

•Light Attack: Deals {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_PrimaryAttack.DmgCoef * 100]}% <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_slash_opaque" xPadding="0" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img> damage.

A melee weapon that utilizes its long reach for aggressive thrusting attacks. Perfect for keeping targets at a distance, strategic positioning, and applying persistent pressure to targets.

•Light Attack: Deals {[DamageTable.2H_Spear_PrimaryAttack.DmgCoef * 100]}% <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_thrust_opaque" xPadding="0" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img> damage.

2-Handed. A melee weapon with significant reach that specializes in thrust damage.

A versatile ranged weapon that can rapidly fire arrows or be fully drawn to achieve maximum damage. Great for maintaining distance while utilizing a variety of attacks to hinder and damage enemies.

•Hip-Fire: Deals {[DamageTable.BowAttack_Hipshot.DmgCoef * 100]}% <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_thrust_opaque" xPadding="0" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img> damage.

2-Handed. A ranged weapon that uses arrows. Arrows must be fully drawn before loosing to achieve maximum damage.

A ranged weapon that fires high-damage cartridges. Ideal for keeping targets at a distance with a high payoff for precision.\n\n•Standard Attack: Deals {[DamageTable.MusketAttack1.DmgCoef * 100]}% <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_thrust_opaque" xPadding="0" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img> damage.
1-Handed. Uses Cartridges.

A mighty combat hammer that can cause the earth to quake with its crushing strikes. Ideal for impeding enemies with ground tremors or dealing crippling blows directly to a target.

Cut and polished Amber Gemstones.
Cut and polished Amethyst Gemstones. Can be crafted into jewelry to increase Intelligence and Focus, or socketed into equipment to provide the Abyssal and Abyssal Ward perks.
Cut and polished Aquamarine Gemstones. Can be crafted into jewelry to increase Dexterity, or socketed into equipment to provide the Empowered and Elemental Ward perks.
Cut and polished Carnelian Gemstones
Cut and polished Citrine Gemstones
Cut and polished Diamond Gemstones. Can be crafted into jewelry to increase Constitution and Focus, or socketed into equipment to provide the Rally and Wilderness Ward perks.
Cut and polished Emerald Gemstones. Can be crafted into jewelry to increase Dexterity and Constitution, or socketed into equipment to provide the Opportunist and Thrust Ward perks.
Cut and polished Garnet Gemstones
Cut and polished Jade Gemstones
Cut and polished Jasper Gemstones. Can be crafted into jewelry to increase Strength and Constitution, or socketed into equipment to provide the Retaliate and Strike Ward perks.
Cut and polished Lapis Lazuli Gemstones
Cut and polished Malachite Gemstones. Can be crafted into jewelry to increase Intelligence and Constitution, or socketed into equipment to provide the Cruel and Spectral Ward perks.
Cut and polished Moonstone Gemstones. Can be crafted into jewelry to increase Strength and Focus, or socketed into equipment to provide the Exhilarate and Slash Ward perks.
Cut and polished Onyx Gemstones. Can be crafted into jewelry to increase Constitution, or socketed into equipment to provide the Brash and Physical Ward perks.
Cut and polished Opal Gemstones. Can be crafted into jewelry to increase Focus, or socketed into equipment to provide the Gambit and Elemental Ward perks.
Cut and polished Ruby Gemstones. Can be crafted into jewelry to increase Strength, or socketed into equipment to provide the Ignited and Fire Ward perks.
Cut and polished Sapphire Gemstones. Can be crafted into jewelry to increase Intelligence, or socketed into equipment to provide the Empowered and Magic Ward perks.
Cut and polished Topaz Gemstones. Can be crafted into jewelry to increase Dexterity and Focus, or socketed into equipment to provide the Electrified and Lightning Ward perks.
